assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The survey met criteria for an operational quality improvement activity according to the policy defining activities which constitute research at the University of Vermont/University of Vermont Medical Center. This project did not require IRB review nor informed consent because it did not meet the definition of a research activity under 45 CFR 46.102(d).
